message: Let's start with a generous offer. Will you accept?
You were too generous, now it's time to get a fair share
You think you're getting a fair share? I'm not giving up yet!
You're not getting all the marbles, Bob! Meet me in the middle?
You're getting closer to the truth, but still too far off
You're not getting the upper hand that easily! I'll hold out for a better deal.
I'm not backing down! Meet me at 52-48?
Getting closer, but I'm not giving up my edge
You're not getting the edge you think you are! I'll keep pushing for a better deal.
I'm not afraid to take a slight edge. Will you meet me at 49-51?
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving in yet
Desperate? Maybe, but I'm not giving up yet! You're not getting the upper hand that easily.
It's time to call a draw. 50-50, no more games.
